name: Grand Theft Auto
description: Script for the free version of the game provided by Rockstar games
notes: To run the game in full screen mode switch off the "Windowed (virtual desktop)" setting under "Runner options". This does not work on all hardware.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto/WINO/Grand Theft Auto.exe

content:
files:
- installer: https://gta.com.ua/files/iso/GTAINSTALLER.exe
- unzip_tool: https://lutris.net/files/tools/unzip.tar.gz
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto/WINO/Grand Theft Auto.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $unzip_tool
- execute:
    args: -o $installer -d $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/unzip
- task:
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
- task:
    app: mfc42
    name: winetricks
- task:
    description: Running installer
    executable: $CACHE/GTAINSTALLER/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
- task:
    description: Running settings
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto/GTA
      Settings.exe
    name: wineexec
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
